Job Description:
FAST INVEST is a P2P Investment platform where investing is made easy. Recently, our company was recognized by The Silicon Review among the Top 50 Fastest Growing Companies of the Year 2019. 545% growth of the investment volume, more than 33k customers from 55 countries .
We are committed to attracting and retaining the best team of talented professionals, and to create a better working culture where everyone can develop and use their best skills in the FinTech industry. By retaining leading talent anchored in a culture of integrity, we can operate according to our guiding principles and ensure excellent service and a healthy team environment.

About the role:
This is an exciting opportunity for talented, motivated and relationships driven person to join Fintech world as CEO assistant. You will work closely with the team leader and you will support her with day-to-day tasks. So your primary role will be to assist, plan everything and be always ready to do something unpredictable. This role requires high flexibility and the ability to answer your phone 24/7.

Your experience & skills:
You have a bachelor’s degree, preferably in finance-related fields.
You have experience working at Fintech or Tech company (it would be your superpower!).
You are very good at planning (ohh super good!).
You have excellent attention to detail.
You have perfect communication skills.
You are a team player with no ego.
Your English is fluent (both written and verbal).
You are loyal, trustworthy and superrrrr confidential.

Key responsibilities:
Support the CEO to ensure her diary management and execution, including arranging meals and ensuring everything is where it needs to be.
Creating a list of tasks and priorities for the CEO.
Manage and maintain calendars.
Schedule calls and meetings.
Manage a very busy inbox, highlight key emails, keep track of responses and any follow-ups required.
Participate in preparation for meetings, preparing papers and all required material.
Coordinate all travel arrangements (flight check-in, transportation to and from the airport, hotel, etc.).
Handle confidential information with integrity.
Deliver the operating rhythm to the team.
Build strong relationships across the organization.‍

Your superpowers:
Always ready for everything.
Superhero at planning.‍
There is not an impossible task for you.
Ability to travel the world more than one time per month.
You can find solution in the situation when it looks like where is no solution at all.
Thinking and doing everything really fast.
Can take care of everything and be everywhere.
Having an eye for stylish things and strong aesthetic.
...We are not searching for an unicorn, but close to it.

We offer:
Possibility to work with international projects and go across our offices in Europe.
Competitive salary and rewards based on achieved results.
Fancy offices in the Barcelona & Kaunas city center.
Multicultural environment.
Great work-life balance culture.
Team events and much more

All candidates must be eligible to work in Kaunas.

ABOUT US

FAST INVEST was recognized by The Silicon Review among the Top 50 Fastest Growing Companies of the year 2019. Recently, the company started expanding into the real estate industry. So this is an excellent opportunity for a Construction Manager to join our team and use your technical skills and knowledge to contribute to the success of new projects in the market. FAST INVEST has an intention to inspire people and be always ready to pursue bigger goals.

ABOUT YOU
You do not come to work for the sake of just working. You are passionate about real estate and what you do. Willingness to approach projects with a can-do attitude and create a process where one does not exist. Comfortable in a fast-moving, fluid environment. Your previous experience with construction projects in Norway is very important for us.

WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING
Ensuring completion of all projects and tasks on time with a passion for accuracy, responsiveness, and in line with the foreseen budget.
Managing multiple projects and tasks in an extremely fast-paced environment.
Supporting all aspects of internal and external project coordination and communication.
Communicating with Norwegian institutions, architects and planning the most efficient way of the construction process.
Searching for trustworthy and reliable construction subcontractors and negotiating with them.
Working with and foreign assigned contractors as well as internal departments ensuring delivery of accurate proposals and quotes.
Building and maintaining strong relationships with partners in Lithuania and Norway by being honest and flexible at the first point of contact.
Attending construction management meetings with potential and current contractors and following up on action items.
Managing risks associated with all projects and tasks – ability to elevate risks through the appropriate channel.

WHAT WE EXPECT FROM YOU
Previous experience with construction projects management in Norway. (SMILE SU SAUKTUKU(
Native Norwegian and Good English language skills (written and oral).
Thorough knowledge of the constructional and architectural processes and materials.
To understand all unique Norwegian-specific requirements that are associated with real estate development.
Ability to work with AutoCAD and BIM programs.
Ability to travel and work from Lithuania’s office.
Detail-oriented and strong organizational skills.

PERSONAL SKILLS
Independent thinker who will take ownership of assignments.
A team player soul looking for growth, both personal and business.
Ability to communicate concisely and clearly.
Curiosity!

WE OFFER
Professional development budget.
Flexible working hours and a special attention to work-life balance.
A horizontal structure where everyone has a voice and makes a direct and valued contribution to building the best product possible.
International team of open-minded people in a nice office environment.
Many fun team events, office parties, and summer ‘weekend-getaway’ to spend some quality time with your colleagues.
